description: 1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T1) - Crown lift branches towards the road up to 5M. Remove dead wood. Standing in Group G11 of Tree Preservation Order (amended)1 x Oak (applicants ref. T2) - Reduce the spread growing over the driveway by 2.0 - 3.0m. Standing in Group G11 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Large Sycamore (applicants ref. T3) - Crown reduce the height of the small secondary stem by 3.0m. Crown reduce the spread of the small secondary stem growing over the driveway by 2m -  3m. Standing in Group G11 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T6) - Crown reduce the height 4.0m and spread by 3.0m. Standing in Group G12 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Chestnut (applicants ref. T7) - Crown reduce the height by 6.0m, remove dead wood. Standing in Group G12 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Chestnut (applicants ref. T8) - Crown reduce the height by 4.0m, reduce spread to balance and shape approx. 1.5m. Standing in Group G12 of Tree Preservation Order.2 x Yew (applicants ref. G1) - Crown reduce the height and spread by 1.5m. Standing in Group G12 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Large Sycamore  (applicants ref. T11) - Crown reduce the height and spread by 4.5m. Standing in Group G12 of Tree Preservation Order.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: R902 - Det affect health and app of tree
